Name: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED
About the game: We are currently in the process of restoring the online servers for the DARK SOULS series on PC. We plan to restore online service for each game progressively, bringing back servers for DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED once we complete the necessary work to correct the problem. We will provide additional updates as soon as the restoration schedule is finalized. We want to thank all our players for your patience and understanding as we work to fix this issue. Then, there was fire. Re-experience the critically acclaimed, genre-defining game that started it all. Beautifully remastered, return to Lordran in stunning high-definition detail running at 60fps. Dark Souls Remastered includes the main game plus the Artorias of the Abyss DLC. Key features: • Deep and Dark Universe • Each End is a New Beginning • Gameplay Richness and Possibilities • Sense of Learning, Mastering and Accomplishment • The Way of the Multiplayer (up to 6 players with dedicated servers)
